page.title: 13THE PARISH HALL
page.content: The Parish Hall is in the middle of the village near the church and school.In the main part there is a small stage (no curtains), a kitchen and lavatories. The hall is run by a committee chaired by Mr. T. Roberts who organise hiring etc. Many organisations use the hall including The Primary School - P.E.and drama. Child Health Clinic Playschool Brownies Women's Institute Gardening Association Charity Discos and Dances Public Meetings for the village. There have been improvements in recent years. The kitchen has been modernised and the stage carpeted.This summer the hall will be closed for redecoration.
